translations: 超级英雄（superhero 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Ewan Drum has always liked superheroes.
sentences.translation: 伊万·德拉姆一直都很喜欢超级英雄。

sentences.sentence: Ants are practically the superheroes of the insect world.
sentences.translation: 蚂蚁是昆虫世界的超级英雄。

sentences.sentence: You may like pets, parties, presents, foods, and even superheroes!
sentences.translation: 你可能会喜欢宠物、派对、礼物、食物，甚至超级英雄！
